name: History Quiz
overview: Learn to program and then learn your history, this game was included in book "40 Educational Games for the Commodore 64". Here's a chance to catch up on your history lessons without looking silly getting the answer wrong. With multiple choice answers and the ability to alter and add questions by changing the programming. (When you add questions on line 600-800 make sure to modify lines 70, 80, 110 and 200 to reflect these changes.)
